title: My Next.js App
description: This is a simple Next.js application with internationalization support.

PostPage.title: Post Details
PostPage.commentDescription: View a specific comment on this post
PostPage.postNotFound: The post you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed.
PostPage.commentNotFoundDescription: The comment you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed. Showing the post without highlighting.
PostPage.replyNotFoundDescription: The reply you're looking for doesn't exist or has been removed. Showing the post without highlighting.
PostPage.errorFetchingPost: There was a problem loading this post. Please try again later.

chat.choose: Choose a chat from the sidebar to start messaging

meeting.title: Meeting Sessions
meeting.subtitle: Create and join video meetings with your team
meeting.joinBySecretIdDesc: Enter a secret ID to join an existing meeting
meeting.createNewRoomDesc: Create a new meeting room and share the secret ID
meeting.noRooms: No rooms created yet. Create your first room to get started.
meeting.noSessions: No recent sessions. Join a meeting to see session history.
meeting.invalidSecretId: Invalid secret ID or room not found
meeting.roomNameTooShort: Room name must be at least 3 characters long
meeting.privateRoomError: Error creating private room. Please check your settings

tags.title: Tags
tags.discover: Discover trending topics and popular discussions
tags.noTagsDesc: Be the first to create posts with tags!
